p: Despite strong antimicrobial activity of EOs against pathogenic and food spoilage microorganisms, the practical use of EOs in food production industry has been limited, due to adverse flavor changes [ 39]. In this study, a combination of 10 12 CFU/g L. acidophilus with H. persicum EO at the concentration of 2.5 mg/mL (T12) showed remarkable sensorial and also antibacterial results in Iranian white cheese.
